titles.title: A bill to amend section 788(d) of the Public Health Service Act to permit schools of nursing to obtain grants for training projects in geriatrics.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

bill.summary: 3/12/1987--Introduced. Amends the Public Health Service Act to add schools of nursing as eligible recipients of certain grants for training projects relating to geriatric medicine.
